rules_text:
Target opponent looks at the top three cards of your library and separates them into a face-down pile and a face-up pile. Put one pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard.
Equinox {3}{U}{U} [i](If you cast this spell from your hand for its equinox cost, exile it. At your next upkeep, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.)[/i]
